reviewText: This is a well done documentary which portrays an actor whose films are as worth watching today as in the time they were made.  His story is very interesting and you end up really liking him after seeing it.
Very well done

Fascinating subject, but I could've done without the repeated on-screen commentary by Liza Minnelli and Jane FONDA?  Also I saw no mention of two of Peck's best movies:  On the Beach and The Big Country (although I may've missed something when trying to skip past comrade Fonda's blathering).
I think so
Movie Icon
i love him
A bit dated but OK to watch.
Lots of  good interviews with Hollywood luminaries.
Well documented and presented.
As with the man, totally superb.
Love Gregory Peck--there will never be another one.  Didn't realize he make so many movies which were all good and different. Luke, in Duel in the Sun and then a priest.
With Gregory Peck, how could they go wong?
Interesting. Mr Pecks personal life is very interesting.
Mr. Peck was a great actor.  Thanks for this edition.

A well done bio pic of one of Hollywood's iconic stars. Much of it in his words, with famous clips that make you want to go find the movies they are from. I had never actually seen Roman Holiday. What a sweet movie.

Not enough information on him, but what was shown was not enough for me.  They barely slipped in that he had another wife beside the one they talk about.  And don't mention about his affair/s or anything.  But he is one of my favorite actors.

I think that the bio of Gerogry Peck was very interesting I really like Gerogry Peck and his flims like GUNS OF NAVRONE, TO kill a Mockingbird
both of those flims in my oppion were his best flims.

Loved this documentary, Gregory pack is awesome.  Didn't realize all the things off screen.  Very well done.  I aslo watch William Holden in the
Hollywood connection.
It was so interesting and informative. Very entertaining! I loved it.
Very dated but still interesting...
Gregory Peck is an American treasure.
I commend this biography. Gregory Peck is certainly an example of what a human being should be and conducted his life accordingly.

Fantastic collection and depiction of Mr Peck's life. It show the man, the actor, and marvelous interviews by actors who knew and worked with him; the inside story. What an inspiration on living life fully!
It was what I expected
I love old Hollywood!!!!
Great!
I always loved Gregory peck's movies. It was interesting to learn more about his life.
A classic movie.  A must for everyone to see.  It is more timely now, after the release of a new Harper Lee's book.
Interesting man, interesting life, so versatile in his career.
Admired this man, his work and the causes for which he stood. Class act.
Interesting and well done.
Wonder actor - super film
Loved it. I learned a lot, that I didn't know, about an actor I already liked that made me like him even more.
He was truly one of Hollywood's best. He was an excellent actor and what I have read about the man, he was a person with a very fine character; and people who were in the movie industry looked up to.

Streamed this movie because of the recent attention to the book and therefore the movie, To Kill A Mockingbird, which, of course, Gregory Peck starred in. Found the title extremely interesting. If you're interested in the past golden age of movie making, I highly recommend it

Gregory Peck speaks of his life while other great stars, most of them gone now, relate their stories about working with him and being his friend. He really was a decent, generous hearted, fun-loving man. It was important to him to be a good person and, after tragedy, to be a better father. He was a good and thoughtful friend, an excellent actor besides being so handsome and that wonderful voice. If you are a Gregory Peck fan, you should take a look.
I was trying to get To Kill a Mockingbird & got this by mistake. I don't really enjoy this "Glamorization" of the movie industry stuff. But that is just me & I seem to be in the minority here.
A good all around review of the man and actor.
One of my favorite actors! This is an interesting, quick look at his career which highlights all of the great roles that he played. It was well worth watching.
Loved it! Have always been an avid fan! Thank you!
Never can get enough of Gregory Peck, one of my all time favorites. It was nice to see his story.
Tremendous movie and very well done
This was a wonderful documentary, told in his own words. Watched it twice, actually...
The best.
One of my favorite actors is presented in a very positive way, even his role in "Dual in the Sun".
Great classic.
Nice look at Gregory Peck.
Entertaining and informative video biography of Gregory Peck's life. I recommend it to fans of Mr. Peck's work.
the movie fairly shows the biography of  Mr. Peck in interesting and objective way.
I was so glad I could watch this on Amazon Prime. He was a great actor and an outstanding human being.
excellnte
It like new , it ran great , I enjoy it so much. and will for manny years thank you. ART
A  very  thoughtful  and  comprehensive  tour  through  his  career. I  simply  enjoyed  it.  There  were  many  things  about  Mr.  Peck  I  did  not  know. I  am  82.
This was bittersweet. I really enjoyed watching his career, but, there are no men in movies now who measure up to him.

Watched this for free on my kindle. I am a fan of Gregory Peck. this documentary was done as part of a series in the 1990s. i liked that is showed clips of the actor's movies and told some facts about his life. no dirt or gossip.
This film made Mr. Peck out to be real and not at all a movie star. He had separate lives and it seems great children who adored him.
I really enjoy listening to the lives of the actors and their backgrounds.  It reminds me of the classic movies I've enjoyed in the past and still enjoy from time to time.
They don't make 'em like this anymore. He was handsome and seemed such a nice person. A real 'star'. Interesting to watch
I found this most interesting and enjoyable watching. When we like someone who was was so talented , it's great to know what others think about them

Well done, informative. Interesting to learn the background of iconic Hollywood figures. These video profiles, many of them done while the person was living, illuminate the real people behind the persona.
documentary of his life, and loves. I enjoyed finding new thing about a star that I admired. Well done work.
Gregory Peck is my favorite actor of all time. You just feel the presence of a genuine soul. Wish Amazon Prime had all his movies!
I've always been a big fan of Gregory Peck since I was about 5 years old when I saw the movie "Moby Dick". Loved him in "To Kill a Mockingbird", too. Very classy gentleman.
great biography
I really enjoyed watching this , learned alot of information about him and his life that I hadn't ever read about .
This documentary only added to my admiration of this great actor.
With no clear direction, look what he made of this life.  Opportunity for those who were protected from sexism, by power.
Very interesting and entertaining biopic on a great Hollywood icon.  Enjoyed watching it.
Great biography about one of my favorite actors.
just okay....
Very good documentary. I removed a star because I thought it was a bit slow.
